alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 5:00PM MDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...Brief Landspout Tornadoes Possible... At 459 PM MDT, conditions are becoming favorable for the development of landspout tornadoes from Cheyenne Wells to Weskan and Tribune. However, at this time it is unknown which if any storm would produce a landspout. Any tornadoes which develop are expected to pose a limited threat. This landspout threat will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Cheyenne County County in east central Colorado, southwestern Wallace and western Greeley Counties in west central Kansas. Landspout tornadoes can form with a developing thunderstorm before rain, hail, and even thunder is observed. Landspout tornadoes are not usually associated with a wall cloud and are often difficult to detect with weather radar. &&
